subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Bills, now 2-0, defeated their A.F.C. East rivals the Miami Dolphins in their first home game since Ralph C. Wilson Jr., the only owner in the team’s history, died in March.
snippet: The Bills, now 2-0, defeated their A.F.C. East rivals the Miami Dolphins in their first home game since Ralph C. Wilson Jr., the only owner in the team’s history, died in March.
